alert.note: Alert for Chemung; Schuyler; Seneca; Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:24PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Seneca, western Schuyler, Yates, northwestern Chemung and northeastern Steuben Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 624 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rushville to Coopers Plains. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Hector, Starkey, Campbell, Benton, Urbana, Potter, Watkins Glen, Dundee and Montour Falls. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 40 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
